meanings.definition: A compound consisting of a ribose sugar and a nucleoside base.
meanings.sent1: I learned in science class that ribonucleosides are important molecules in our bodies.
meanings.sent2: RNA contains ribonucleosides, which are essential for its structure and function.
meanings.sent3: The ribonucleosides in the cell were having a party, dancing around the nucleus.
meanings.sent4: Her love for biology was like a ribonucleoside, binding her to the wonders of life.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the ribonucleosides sparkled like tiny jewels in the cell.

meanings.definition: A building block of RNA molecules.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study how ribonucleosides come together to form RNA.
meanings.sent2: RNA synthesis involves the assembly of ribonucleosides into long chains.
meanings.sent3: The ribonucleosides in the lab were busy constructing a tiny RNA house.
meanings.sent4: In the genetic code, ribonucleosides are the bricks that build the RNA building.
meanings.sent5: The ribonucleosides lined up like obedient soldiers, ready to form RNA when called upon.
